title: 3.1 Master Challenge 1
question: Our Earth is becoming warmer year after year. It is referred to as global warming. Search a YouTube video using these keywords and embed it on your web page Climatic Changes.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
